TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Bsiyo, title = Bsiyo, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bsiyo} }

S.FORM: = Bsiyo/ Bsiyaw/ Bsiyaw = Waso na bsiyo bbaro so hari qumi hnyegan na, sduduy puting qmuru ka phepah na. Waso ma phepah na bsiyo nii ge, uuqun na duma kui plale duri. Netun ta mangal waso na bsiyo ita Seediq ge, pllayun daha hngedun hayan, ririh so mhenuk hari waso na dhenu. Kiya ngalun daha lmabu hlama butun ma hei camac. Netun mosa lmiqu ka rudan ma skadi negul ge, mangal btunux ma qhuni sbetun na qmuru bsiyo dehuk temaq ma, phdagun na dungal. Ado mknedux riyung ka rehak na ma uka knkelun psetuq duri, kiya malu riyung slmeun negul. Rhequn rehak na, niqan so hari kadi bhege seedan toma qmuru, kiya ngalun laqi slmeun daha sdoduy baga ma sllugan nduyung.

= Bsiyo/ Bsiyaw/ Bsiyaw = Waso na bsiyo bbaro so hari qomi hnyegan na, sdodoy poting qmoro ka phepah na. Waso ma phepah na bsiyo nii ge, ooqon na doma koi plale dori. Neton ta mangal waso na bsiyo ita Seediq ge, pllayon daha hngedon hayan, ririh so mhenok hari waso na dheno. Kiya ngalon daha lmabo hlama boton ma hei camac. Neton mosa lmiqo ka rodan ma skadi negol ge, mangal btonox ma qhoni sbeton na qmoro bsiyo dehok temaq ma, phdagon na dongal. Ado mknedox riyong ka rehak na ma oka knkelon psetoq dori, kiya malo riyong slmeon negol. Rheqon rehak na, niqan so hari kadi bhege seedan toma qmoro, kiya ngalon laqi slmeon daha sdodoy baga ma sllogan ndoyong.
